quest.name: Kindled Spirit
journal: Alphinaud is in need of a helping hand.
objectives: Survey the designated locations and defeat any voidsent that appear.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: I can't say I understand Alisaie's answer, but a debt is a debt.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: At first I didn't know what to make of Zero, but her frankness speaks to me. I like her!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: My thanks again for agreeing to help.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The Ilsabard contingent brings in shipments of food, medicine, and other necessities by airship.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We have yet to deliver a share of supplies to Tertium, and I would appreciate it if one of you could assist us with the task today.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Well, Forename. It looks like you're with me, then.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Voidsent sightings have been increasing by the day, which is why I had a mind to go out and patrol the Eblan Rime. Shall we?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Voidsent were spotted here not long ago. Considering the proximity to Camp Broken Glass, everyone is understandably concerned.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: But hopefully not for much longer. You follow this road eastward, and I'll have a look to the north. If you should encounter any voidsent, I won't begrudge you for dispatching them without me.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You survey your surroundings, but do not spy any errant voidsent...
